bike.description: Bigg'ns 6061 straight-gauge aluminum w/eccentric BB, reinforced HT, box section TT & DT, manipulated seatstays & chainstays, cold-forged dropouts

components.description: Marzocchi Dirt Jumper 3, 100mm travel, hydraulic damping, coil elastomer spring
Shimano M475 front hub/Bontrager Race Disc singlespeed mini-cassette rear hub, Bontrager Ranger disc rims, 36h
Bontrager Earl Riser, 25mm rise, 690mm width, 9d backsweep, 4d upsweep, 31.8mm
